Description:
We're seeking a motivated Digital Marketer and operations assistant to join our team and play an important role in expanding our online presence and driving growth in the competitive market and also to be involved in the operations.  Position Overview: As a Digital Marketer, you'll create and execute effective digital marketing strategies that increase brand visibility, engage prospective clients, and drive lead generation through various online channels. You'll collaborate closely with our sales and marketing teams to align our online efforts with our business objectives and ensure a seamless customer experience. The ideal candidate has a deep understanding of digital marketing and a proven record of delivering measurable results.  Responsibilities  Develop and execute digital marketing campaigns to promote our offers, showcase listings, and attract potential owners and guests.  
Create tailored content for social media, website, emails, blogs, etc., engaging and educating our target audience.  
Use SEO techniques to optimize content and drive organic traffic, enhancing search engine rankings.  
Manage paid advertising campaigns on platforms like Google Ads, Facebook Ads, and more to generate leads.  
Collaborate with the creative team to produce compelling visuals and assets.  
Stay informed about market trends and emerging digital marketing strategies.  
Assist in developing and executing email marketing campaigns. 
Assist in operations management: Guest communication, check-in/check-out process execution, coordination with the internal team (designer, cleaner, maintenance) to make sure that the property is ready on time for the guest.    Skills
Skills:
Digital Marketing Capabilites 
Must be creative and well organized. 
Proficiency in digital marketing tools, social media management, SEO, email marketing, and paid advertising. 
Excellent English written and verbal communication skills. 
Analytical mindset with the ability to draw actionable insights from data. 
Proven ability to manage multiple projects and meet deadlines. 
Knowledge of marketing automation tools and CRM systems is a plus.  
Fast learner and curious.
